guidelines:
Welcome to Kujiratori discord, if you are there for mercing please contact an officer if not already done.
If you want access to the nsfw-lewd channel, type `?sub lewd` in the discord
gearhelp:
The bot commands are the following :
`[classname] [ap] [aap] [dp]` - register your class and gear in the list, replace any previous entry
or `[classname]` - register your class in the list, replace any previous entry
`?gear [name]` (any channel) - show the gear of the player by name
`?gear [mention]` (any channel) - show the gear of the player by mention
`?stats` (any channel) - show stats for all classes
or `?stats [classname]` (any channel) - show stats for specified class
or `?stats [dayname]` (any channel) - show stats for the signed up as yes on that day
